channel.title: Moparscape crashing FireFox?
channel.description:
Just today, I began to experience problems when browing the Moparscape forums with Firefox. I started looking through the Client Hacking tutorials, and it crashed. At first, I didn't think anything was wrong, since FireFox crashes on occasion for me. However, it happened again when I restored all my tabs. Same result after 3 more tries. :| After stopping FireFox from restoring Moparscape, it stopped crashing. When I opened up a new tab and loaded the site again, it started crashing the browser again. I think this has only been happening in the Client Hacking board though.
Has anyone else ever had a problem with this? I think the weirdest thing about this is that no other SMF site does this. O.o

item.title: Moparscape crashing FireFox?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Actually, the same thing has been happening to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape crashing FireFox?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Just went and looked, Not crashing for me, Might need to uninstall and then re-install Firefox, that or it needs updates. Unless, its a possibility you have a plugin thats doing it.

Read full topic
